overview: Lisa lives with her mother, an indifferent sister and a silly dog. She sincerely believes that she will be able to fall in love with Vadik, imagining their relationship in the spirit of the 2000s movies. Once, having received an invitation to a party from Vadik, Lisa under the careful guidance of friends decides to achieve her goal and meet the guy of her dreams. However, the reality is not as fabulous as the girl's dreams. Despite Vadik's indifference, Lisa persistently proves to herself and the world that this is the same true love. Painfully overcoming the indifference of family, friends, management, she hopes to hear the coveted "I love you."
title: Well You Are a Fool Lisa
